means: 偏离，越轨( deviate的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I compromise by using a prepared text and deviating from it whenever I feel the need.
sentence.Network_cn: 我搞折衷办法,准备一份讲稿,觉得需要的时候就自由发挥.

sentence.Network_en: Theories deviating practices are inane , while practices deviating theories are blindfold.
sentence.Network_cn: 脱离实践的理论是空泛的, 脱离理论指导的实践是盲目的.

sentence.Network_en: Deviating greatly from the norm in appearance or structure; abnormal.
sentence.Network_cn: 器官或细胞不正常的发育或不正常的结构.

PerfectNetExp.abs: deviating stress 偏斜应力deviating 使井偏斜；偏离deviation absorption 偏移吸收
deviatedwellbore 斜井, deviating 偏斜的, deviating 偏差

list.abs: 绝对偏差(Absolute deviation)绝对偏差是指某一次测量值与平均值的差异,即:d_i=x_i-\bar{x}其中:d_i表示绝对偏差;x_i表示测定值;\bar{x}表示多次测定算术.
标准差（standard deviation）（Standard Deviation） ，也称均方差（mean square error），是各数据偏离平均数的距离的平均数，它是离均差平方和平均 …
消防专业英语词汇表 ... Stack pressure 烟囱压力 Standard deviation 标准偏差 Staring for fire fighting 灭火出动.
谁能给我一些关于统计的英文的单词？？_百度知道 ... average 平均数 average deviation 平均差 bar chart 直条图、条图.
一个观测值同规定值之间的偏差。5.5 平均偏差(mean deviation)各观测值与其算术平均值的绝对偏差(即偏差的绝对值)的平均值。.

entry.def: To deviate from something means to start doing something different or not planned, especially in a way that causes problems for others.

example.ex: They stopped you as soon as you deviated from the script...
example.tran: 一旦你偏离了剧本的内容，他们就会喊停。

example.ex: He planned his schedule far in advance, and he didn't deviate from it...
example.tran: 他提前很早就制订出了自己的进度表，然后从未偏离过它。

auth_sentence.content: A most devoted wife...never deviating in admiration of her husband.
auth_sentence.res_content: A most devoted wife...never deviating in admiration of her husband.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A most devoted wife...never deviating in admiration of her husband.

auth_sentence.content: The Romney camp lives in terror of deviating from the months-old script.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Romney camp lives in terror of deviating from the months-old script.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Romney camp lives in terror of deviating from the months-old script.

auth_sentence.content: If any decision meant deviating from our policy, the answer was No.
auth_sentence.res_content: If any decision meant deviating from our policy, the answer was No.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If any decision meant deviating from our policy, the answer was No.
